mapper.select: SELECT receiver_area_id AS areaId, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM trade_order AS s WHERE s.receiver_area_id = m.receiver_area_id) AS orderCreateCount, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM trade_order AS s WHERE s.receiver_area_id = m.receiver_area_id AND s.pay_status = TRUE AND s.deleted = FALSE) AS orderPayCount, (SELECT SUM(s.pay_price) FROM trade_order AS s WHERE s.receiver_area_id = m.receiver_area_id AND s.pay_status = TRUE AND s.deleted = FALSE) AS orderPayPrice FROM trade_order m WHERE deleted = FALSE GROUP BY receiver_area_id

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(user_id)) FROM trade_order WHERE pay_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} AND pay_status = TRUE AND deleted = FALSE
